title: PFMS A3
shortDesc: Mobile robot with autonomous navigation and mapping.
fullDesc: Practical Foundations of Mobile Systems assignment involving autonomous robot navigation. Implemented path planning algorithms, sensor fusion, and real-time control systems. Focus on practical robotics principles and hands-on hardware integration.

title: RS1 SLAM
fullDesc: Implemented SLAM (Simultaneous Localization and Mapping) for autonomous robot navigation. Integrated multiple sensors, developed feature detection algorithms, and created real-time mapping visualization. Key learning in robotic perception and spatial reasoning.

title: Fetch Robot Vision
shortDesc: Computer vision system for object detection and tracking.
fullDesc: Developed computer vision systems using ArUco markers and object detection algorithms for autonomous robot operation. Implemented real-time image processing pipeline, sensor calibration, and integration with robotic control systems. Skills: OpenCV, Python, ROS.

title: IR Sensor Project
shortDesc: Infrared sensing and signal processing system.
fullDesc: Designed and built an infrared sensing system for environmental monitoring and proximity detection. Implemented analog signal conditioning, digital processing, and data visualization. Applied practical electronics and sensor calibration techniques.

title: Mobile Dynamics & Control
shortDesc: Control systems for mobile robot dynamics.
fullDesc: Studied and implemented control algorithms for mobile robot systems. Analyzed dynamics, developed feedback control strategies, and tested on real hardware. Focus on control theory applications in robotics.

title: Robotic System Navigation
fullDesc: Developed autonomous navigation systems for robots operating in real-world environments. Implemented obstacle avoidance, path planning, and sensor-based decision making. Tested reliability and adaptability of the navigation stack.

title: FPGA Demo
shortDesc: Digital logic implementation on FPGA hardware.
fullDesc: Implemented digital circuits and algorithms on FPGA hardware. Gained hands-on experience with hardware description languages, real-time processing, and embedded system design. Explored parallel processing capabilities.

title: UR3 Robot Manipulation
shortDesc: Collaborative robot arm programming and control.
fullDesc: Programmed and controlled the UR3 collaborative robot arm for manipulation tasks. Developed end-effector control strategies, motion planning, and human-robot interaction protocols. Applied real robotics in industrial context.
